options.name: Default

name: Custom Wood Carved Pub Sign w/Scottish Lion
description:
Change the name to what you want. Just contact me with your order and let me know.

The size of sign pictured is approximately 16" x 17" x 1". Our signs can be scaled up or down in size, but of course the price will change with the size.

Made in the USA. High quality, hand painted, carved cedar wood Pub sign. Texture carved into the background to give it a weathered wood look. Letters, and picture are all raised and hand painted. There will be a groove carved in the back to hang from, but you can add hardware if needed.

Great gift idea!

options.name: Default

name: Happy Thanksgving Centerpiece - Carved Wood Sign
description:
Happy Thanksgiving!

Please choose black and gold, or maroon and gold. You can choose other color/stain/image combinations, just contact me first.

The size of sign pictured is approximately 14" x 8"

Made in the USA. High quality, hand painted, carved plaque. Texture carved into the background to give it a weathered wood look. Letters, and picture are all raised and hand painted. There will be a groove carved in the back to hang from, but you can add hardware if needed, or use as a centerpiece in a plate holder.

Great gift idea for the cook!

See my other signs for personalized signs, or contact me for custom orders. I make all of these in NJ.

name: Custom Wood Carved Last name Holiday Sign - Solid Cedar
description:
The color and size will be as pictured unless you specify changes in the check out.

The size is approximately 17" x 8".

Also remember to add the name you want in the check out.

Try different pictures to represent your family. Just let me know! Some changes may require an extra cost depending on degree of difficulty, so please email me before you place your order.

Made in the USA. High quality, hand painted, carved solid cedar plaque. Texture carved into the background to give it a weathered wood look. Letters, pictures, and border are all raised and hand painted. There will be a groove carved in the back to hang from, but you can add hardware if needed. Great gift idea!

See my other signs for personalized signs, or contact me for custom orders. I make all of these here in NJ.

name: Custom Carved Merry Christmas Sign
description:
Merry Christmas!

The size of sign pictured is approximately 14" x 9" x 3/4". Made of MDF- recommended to stay indoors.

Made in the USA. High quality, hand painted, carved plaque. Texture carved into the background to give it a weathered wood look. Letters, and picture are all raised and hand painted. There will be a groove carved in the back to hang from, but you can add hardware if needed, or use as a centerpiece in a plate holder.

Let me know if you would like the green background with red letters or brown background with gold letters. You may also ask for custom colors and I will let you know if I can do it.

Great gift idea!

You supply the hardware to display unless you request in your order.

Price varies due to size and detail of carving. This is a single sided sign. A sign similar to this size and design is $55.00.

Made in the USA. High quality, hand painted, carved solid plaque. Texture carved into the background to give it a weathered wood look. Letters and border are all raised and hand painted. There will be a groove carved in the back to hang from, but you can add hardware if needed.

Great gift idea!
